gold.user: User wants to retrieve a list of all SIP IP Access Control Lists associated with their Twilio account.
gold.ideal: Returns a JSON array of SIP IP Access Control Lists with details such as SID, friendly name, and date created.

gold.user: User needs to create a new SIP IP Access Control List to manage access for specific IP addresses.
gold.ideal: Returns the SID of the newly created SIP IP Access Control List along with its details.

gold.user: User wants to fetch details of a specific SIP IP Access Control List using its SID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified SIP IP Access Control List, including its friendly name and IP addresses.

gold.user: User wants to update the friendly name of an existing SIP IP Access Control List.
gold.ideal: Returns the updated details of the SIP IP Access Control List, confirming the changes made.

gold.user: User needs to delete a specific SIP IP Access Control List that is no longer needed.
gold.ideal: Returns a success message confirming the deletion of the SIP IP Access Control List.
